name: certs:generate
desc: Generate a key and certificate signing request (or self-signed certificate)

params.name: --selfsigned
params.desc: generate a self-signed certificate instead of a CSR

params.name: --owner NAME
params.desc: name of organization certificate belongs to

params.name: --country COUNTRY
params.desc: country of owner, as a two-letter ISO country code

params.name: --area AREA
params.desc: sub-country area (state, province, etc.) of owner

params.name: --now
params.desc: do not prompt for any owner information
